original_text: Then put the lid on the top of the box. Put the flat stones with the words of the covenant into the box. I will give those to you.
korean_text: 속죄소를 궤 위에 얹고 내가 네게 줄 증거판을 궤 속에 넣으라

sentences.original_text: Then put the lid on the top of the box.
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그 상자의 맨 위에 뚜껑을 올려놓으라.

sentences.original_text: Put the flat stones with the words of the covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 언약의 말씀이 적힌 평평한 돌판들을 넣고

sentences.original_text: I will give those to you.
